continuum-skin-desc:
Bɔɔmi 2 Continuum niŋgbana:
 
* 11- nannana MonoBook buudir nɛ li nindapaalim nɛ amɛŋ tʋʋma bɛdegʋ tuon ken.
*- continuum la nɔbigi paasWMF[[mw:Desktop Improvements]] tʋʋma
prefs-continuum-enable-continuum-1-label: Nɔkim laʋk kanɛ nar la tʋm
prefs-continuum-enable-continuum-1-help:
Yʋma banɛ kenna la, ti na tisid gbaʋŋ laʋk labaar bi'el-bi'el. Sida suor laʋk la na kɛ ka fʋ gɔs laʋk kʋdʋg la zi'esim (nwɛnnɛ samanpiid nwadig 19). Azamis yɛla bɛdegʋ Kat wa'ae nɛ labapaala nii,kemi ti mw
[[mw:Reading/Web/Desktop_Improvements|project page]].
continuum-opt-out-tooltip: Tiakimi fʋ zi'esim la n lɛb nya'aŋ keŋ gbaʋŋ kʋdir la nindaagin
continuum-language-button-aria-label: Kem labaar kanɛ sɔb bɛ buudi piank ayinne ni. Bɛnɛɛ {{PLURAL:$1$1 language|$1 languages}}
continuum-no-language-button-aria-label: Sɔb labaar kaŋa bɛnɛ pian'ʋk kaŋa ni ma'a.paasim sɔb labaar la bɛ buudi pian'ʋk kɔn'ɔb kɔn'ɔbin
continuum-anon-user-menu-pages-label: Zamisim bɛdegʋ Kat wa'ae nɛ a-maal sɔbʋg yɛla
continuum-prefs-limited-width-help: Sʋŋim yalʋŋ giŋ suodɔllisim ka li nɔbig karʋŋ baŋir
empty-language-selector-body: Lakir yɛlkpana pʋ siak sʋŋ bɛ buudi pian'ad sieba nam nii
continuum-toc-unpinned-popup: Teebul la yɛlkpana vudigi kpɛn' kpɛla na
continuum-page-tools-unpinned-popup: La'ad dɔɔg la vudigi kpɛn' kpɛla na
continuum-main-menu-unpinned-popup: La'ad Dɔmɛŋir la vudigi kpɛn' kpɛla na
continuum-appearance-unpinned-popup: Nindanwaasim dɔɔg vudigi kpɛn' kpɛla ni
continuum-beta-preview-description: Ieem suori kpɛn' karʋŋ paamʋg bɛllim paala la ni,nwɛnnɛ taipɔgirafi nɔbigir nɛ sabilig nɛɛsim.
